title: Serious Ranked 5's Team, The Rekkoning Black, Is looking for a Jungle and Mid.
body:
**(At the moment, I want divisions Silver and above, but I will accept applicants Silver 2 and up if they prove themselves, and also only add me if you are free for the practice times.)**

**Information:**
Hello, I’m Jared (DarkCloud360) and I’m attempting to put together a winning team. I had a previous team, but due to disputes involving schedules two members have parted ways leaving us to fill their spots.

**Jungle:**
Looking for a dedicated player that knows about controlling the early game, and can be the team leader also. This position is very important as it has the most impact in the game early. I would like for people to have a big champ pool for this role

**Middle Lane:**
Looking for a good shotcaller, and a somewhat mechanically skilled player. This position I am looking for a team leader and shotcaller. If you have experience in these two fields bonus points to you.

**Also comment down below/tell me in game:**
What are your strengths:
What are your weaknesses:
What your champion pool is
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's:
Will you be dedicated to a Team:
What you can bring to a Team:

**Practice Times and Voice Comms:**
The schedule for practice is: Monday-Friday: 8:30pm-12am/1am EST. Saturday and Sunday we will play if everyone is on for a few hours, but we may have a tournament on Saturdays also.

**Skype is required**

**Closing**
I really hope to hear from anyone that can fit in with these practice times. Thank you for reading .

replies.body:
Hello, I am a Jungle Main;
With These Champions; {{champion:31}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:5}}
im g4 jng ign; ILTxK DON MODE

What are your strengths: Great mechanics, extremely large champion pool, can roam, can shotcall.
What are your weaknesses: I play really aggressive and sometimes getting camped by junglers shut me down.
What your champion pool is: Too many to list here, so i'll do 8. {{champion:103}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:238}} 
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: It's my favorite part of league.
Will you be dedicated to a Team: Of course, if everyone else is.
What you can bring to a Team: Strong carry from mid, can shotcall (only mid-late game)
Hi i was looking for a team ass well and would like to join as your mid laner i play mostly assasin based champs and consider my self very mechanicly skilled in the champ zed and le blanc

What are your strengths: I have a good sense when i can win a fight in mid lane and not and when im able to roam.
What are your weaknesses: It takes me a few trys to get use to a new champ.
What your champion pool is: Its big and still growing i almost have every champ and i love learning new champs.
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: I wanna improve and i like playing with players that know what they need to do to win a game.
Will you be dedicated to a Team: Yes, I am available for the times.
What you can bring to a Team: I use to manage my own team so i know what it takes for a team to be good such like call outs on jungler and summoner spells and warding.
